title: Idhu Vazhvukkum Lyrics Pandigai
stanzas:
Idhu vazhvukkum
saavukkum nadakkura sanda.
inge kannimaikkum
nerathula thundaagum thala.

kaniraththam sindhum neram
mavane unna pudichu
kaiyya kaala adichu udachu
moonja kilichu renda pichchi

idhu uyirukkum nizhalukkum
naduvula oru chinna kadha

cant touch me
am number one
am number Â one
ganster in town

you cant reach me
am top of the game
am top of the game
...*** game.

ooo never been
never seen anything
like me.
never been anywhere
like this.

dai engirundhu
vandhadaa nee.
aanaa pogum podhu
ettu kaalu paadaithaan de

roatu oram picha poattu
soaru podura naaidaa nee
enga bow bow sollu
bow bow ..
vaadaa modhi paaru

unakkum enakkum
enna paga machchaan
aanaa unnoda thalaiyla
panam vachchaa
adippen unna
midhippen unna
ezhumbil koattai
katti naan nippendaa

poda thookki eri
summa poratti adi
andha ezhumba muri
avan kadhaiya mudi

adraa. unna kaetka yaaru
nee thaarumaaru
un aattam kooru
un edhiri
thookidu avana eguri
kurichidu idhu un thogudhi

ooo never been
never seen
anything like me.
never been
anywhere like this.
